home.title: 安全工程 · 智能驱动

projects.title: 项目实战
projects.hexstrike_desc: 基于 Yenn.exe 分支深度定制的红队自动化工具，针对语义分析与命令编排进行了多项功能增强。
projects.orchestrator_desc: 全自动红队渗透智能体，支持智能目标分析、自动化执行与报告生成。
projects.api_scan_desc: GitHub 敏感信息泄露扫描器，支持 OpenAI/Claude 等多平台 Key 异步验证与 TUI 面板。
projects.llm_sec_desc: 专门用于评估大语言模型安全性的研究框架，涵盖对抗性攻击与防御评估。

about.title: 简历及简介
about.intro: 我是一名 2026 届毕业生，目前在 360 (Qihoo 360) 担任 L2 安全分析工程师。专注于高风险环境下的威胁缓解、红队自动化以及 LLM 安全评估。
about.roles_list:
• 360 / L2 安全分析工程师 (2025.08 - 至今)
  • 奇安信 / 安全服务实习生 (2025.05 - 2025.07)
  • 东软 / 运维工程师 (2024.09 - 2025.04)
  • 集成电路设计 / 在读学生
about.interests_desc: 红队自动化 (Red Team Ops), 威胁情报分析, LLM 攻防, 内核安全, 硬件漏洞利用 (Embedded Exploitation)

projects.title: Projects
projects.hexstrike_desc: Deeply customized Red Teaming tool based on Yenn.exe, enhanced with advanced semantic orchestration.
projects.orchestrator_desc: Autonomous agent for offensive security, featuring intelligent target analysis and automated execution.
projects.api_scan_desc: Scanner for leaked Github API keys with async validation for OpenAI/Claude and a TUI dashboard.
projects.llm_sec_desc: Specialized framework for evaluating Large Language Model security, including adversarial testing.

about.title: About & Career
about.intro: I am a student graduating in 2026, currently serving as an L2 Security Analysis Engineer at 360 (Qihoo 360). Specialized in threat mitigation, red team automation, and LLM security.
about.roles_list:
• 360 / L2 Security Analysis Engineer (2025.08 - Present)
  • QiAnXin / Sec Service Intern (2025.05 - 2025.07)
  • Neusoft / O&M Engineer (2024.09 - 2025.04)

about.interests_desc: Red Team Automation, Threat Intelligence, LLM Security, Kernel Internals, Hardware Exploitation
